statements.select: select * from AtCashAccountDetail where AtCashAccountId=#value# order by AtCashAccountDetaiDate

select ad.* from AtCashAccountDetail ad left join AtCashAccount a on a.AtCashAccountId=ad.AtCashAccountId where a.AtCashAccountId in (select AtCashAccountId from AtCashAccount where AtCashAccountMonth between #startdate# and #enddate#) order by a.AtCashAccountMonth
